author: gawor
msg: applied 1753, enables proper serialization of choice elements

author: perryan
msg: The content length of the message was updated to reflect the fact that the operation name is now actually included

author: whitlock
msg: Add trace to the transport library by passing it the addresses of trace methods, so that it can invoke trace methods by address, avoiding the need for the transport library to be linked with the client library.

author: hawkeye
msg: Moved all impls into cpp and out of .h for easier reading

author: hawkeye
msg: setOperation now sets the operation name in the message as well
